org.apache.juneau.serializer

Class SerializerGroupBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerGroupBuilder

  • public class SerializerGroupBuilder
extends Object
    Builder class for creating instances of SerializerGroup.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerializerGroupBuilder()
      Create an empty serializer group builder.
      SerializerGroupBuilder(PropertyStore propertyStore)
      Create an empty serializer group using the specified property store for settings.
      SerializerGroupBuilder(SerializerGroup copyFrom)
      Clone an existing serializer group builder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerializerGroupBuilder

        public SerializerGroupBuilder()
        Create an empty serializer group builder.

      • SerializerGroupBuilder

        public SerializerGroupBuilder(PropertyStore propertyStore)
        Create an empty serializer group using the specified property store for settings.

        Note: Modifying the specified property store externally will also modify it here.

        Parameters:
        propertyStore - The property store containing all settings common to all serializers in this group.

      • SerializerGroupBuilder

        public SerializerGroupBuilder(SerializerGroup copyFrom)
        Clone an existing serializer group builder.
        Parameters:
        copyFrom - The serializer group that we're copying settings and serializers from.

      • build

        public SerializerGroup build()
        Creates a new SerializerGroup object using a snapshot of the settings defined in this builder.

        This method can be called multiple times to produce multiple serializer groups.

        Returns:
        A new SerializerGroup object.

                                            Object value)

      • classLoader

        public SerializerGroupBuilder classLoader(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Specifies the classloader to use when resolving classes from strings for all serializers in this group.

        Can be used for resolving class names when the classes being created are in a different classloader from the Juneau code.

        If null, the system classloader will be used to resolve classes.

        Parameters:
        classLoader - The new classloader.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
        See Also:
        PropertyStore.setClassLoader(ClassLoader)
